message: I propose dividing the money in a 3:1 ratio, with you receiving $2500. I believe this is fair given the inflation rates and our roles in the game.
I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  While I acknowledge your point about inflation, I believe this division reflects a more equitable distribution given the nature of this game.
Considering the inflation rates and aiming for fairness, I propose an equal split of the $10000. This maintains a balance and ensures both of us receive a fair share.
